battleTactics.name: Callous Overlord
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 friendly SUMMONABLE unit more than 3'' from all enemy units. You complete this tactic if that friendly unit is destroyed during this turn.

battleTactics.name: Cursed Unlife
battleTactics.description: You complete this tactic if any wounds allocated to your general or to 2 other friendly VAMPIRE units are healed using The Hunger ability during this turn.
